# endUpdates()

**Instance Method**

Ends the group of updates for the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func endUpdates()
```

## Discussion

Ends the group of updates for the table view. This method, like [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/beginUpdates()], is nestable. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/beginUpdates()] for details.

## Updating the Table View Arrangement

- **beginUpdates()**: Begins a group of updates for the table view.
- **moveRow(at:to:)**: Moves the specified row to the new row location using animation.
- **insertRows(at:withAnimation:)**: Inserts the rows using the specified animation.
- **removeRows(at:withAnimation:)**: Removes the rows using the specified animation.
- **row(for:)**: Returns the index of the row for the specified view.
- **column(for:)**: Returns the column index for the specified view.
